name: Open Field
entrance_details: You find yourself in an open field of tall grass and short trees.
The lights from a tavern flicker in the distance.
observe_details: The massive peaks of the Terminus mountain range are just visible on the horizon
World's End. They say you can hear the Argent Falls from miles away, but you can't hear them yet.
The light is fading, and you've slept on the hard ground for weeks. There's a tavern ahead.
